Package suga.engine.physics.collidables

Interface Collidable

All Superinterfaces:
Physical
All Known Implementing Classes:
ElasticCollider
public interface Collidable extends Physical
An object that can have collisions with other collidable objects.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Collidable
    clone()
    Returns a deep copy of this collidable object.
    void
    collision(Collidable obj)
    Runs collision logic.
    HitBox
    getHitBox()
    Gets the HitBox currently being used by this collidable object.
    void
    setHitBox(HitBox hitBox)
    Assigns the given HitBox to this collidable object.
    void
    touch(Collidable obj)
    Runs touching logic.

    Methods inherited from interface suga.engine.physics.Physical

    getAcceleration, getMass, getPos, getVelocity, setAcceleration, setMass, setPos, setVelocity, update

  • Method Details

    • getHitBox

      HitBox getHitBox()
      Gets the HitBox currently being used by this collidable object.
      Returns:
      The hit box being used by this collidable object.

    • setHitBox

      void setHitBox(HitBox hitBox)
      Assigns the given HitBox to this collidable object. Will likely result in the modification of HitBox location.
      Parameters:
      hitBox - The new HitBox to assign to this Collidable object.

    • collision

      void collision(Collidable obj)
      Runs collision logic. May, but in general should not modify the object passed.
      Parameters:
      obj - The object that this collidable collided with.

    • touch

      void touch(Collidable obj)
      Runs touching logic. May modify the object passed.
      Parameters:
      obj - The object that this collidable is touching.

    • clone

      Collidable clone()
      Returns a deep copy of this collidable object. Used to preserve values of velocity, position, and acceleration during collision calculations.
      Returns:
      A copy of this object with the same position, velocity, and acceleration.
